column2: "Mesee wɔ m’akoma mu dɛ
column3: Afei mobɔsɔ enyigye ahwɛ dɛ mibenya ndzepa bi efi mu a; na

column2: "Muhun wɔ serew na enyigyedze ho dɛ ne nyina yɛ adze a ɔnnkye. Ebɛnadze na wɔwɔ dze ma?"
"Mosɔe hwɛɛ wɔ m’akoma dɛ mubotum dze nsa agye mo honam enyi dɛ ɔkwasea
column3: na ber kor no ara mu manantsew nyansa mu a. Nna mepɛ dɛ muhu dɛ oye ma adasamba dɛ wɔbɛyɛ dɛm wɔ wi yi ase hɔn nkwa nda nyinara mu a."

column2: "Meyɛɛ mo ndwuma akɛse akɛse; misisii adan mefae; metsetsɛɛw wenyin nture fae;"
"meyeyɛɛ nture na enyigyekwaa fae
column3: na metsetsɛɛw mu ndua a ɔsow eduaba horow nyinara;"

column2: "meyeyɛɛ nsutaae fae
column3: dɛ medze no mu nsu bi mubogugu kwaa a wɔnyɛn ndua wɔ mu no do:"

column2: "mototɔɔ nkowaa nye mfonabaa
column3: na minyaa mba a wɔwowoe no so; eso minyaa anantwi nye nguan ekuwekuw akɛsenara seen hɔn a wodzii m’enyim kan wɔ Jerusalɛm nyinara:"

column2: "moboaboaa dwetɛ nye sika so ano fae
column3: na ahemfo nye amansin akoradze soronko: minyaa mbanyin nye mbaa adwontofo

column2: "Nna meyɛɛ ɔkɛse
column3: na meyɛɛ ɔkɛse mbordo seen hɔn a wodzii m’enyim wɔ Jerusalɛm nyinara: eso me nyansaa tsenaa mo mu."

column2: "Na dza m’enyiwa hwehwɛe biara
column3: mammfa ennsuma no: mammfa enyigye biara annkam m’akoma
column4: na m’akoma dzii ehurusi wɔ me berɛ nyinara ntsi; osiandɛ iyi nye me berɛ nyinara ho kyɛfa."

column2: "Ɔno na mohwɛɛ ndwuma a me nsa yɛe nyinara
column3: na ɔberɛ a meberɛe yɛe no: na
column5: ne nyinara yɛ egyangyandze nye ɔberɛ gyan
column6: na mfaso papa biara nnyi wi yi ase."

column2: "Na mesanee dwendween nyansa
column3: na abɔdam nye nkwaseasɛm ho: na ebɛnadze na nyimpa a obedzi ɔhen ekyir aba no botum ayɛ? Mekyerɛ adze a woewie yɛ dada no ara a."

column2: "Nna muhun dɛ saa nyansa mu wɔ mfaso sen nkwaseasɛm
column3: dɛ mbrɛ kan mu wɔ mfaso sen sum no."

column2: "Onyansafo n’enyiwa wɔ ne tsir mu
column3: naaso ɔkwasea dze
column4: ɔnantsew sum mu. Na muhunii so dɛ esian kor no ara na osian hɔn nyinara."

column2: "Ɔno na mekae wɔ m’akoma mu dɛ
column3: Dza ɔba kwasea do no
column4: mbrɛ ɔbɛba mo so mo do ara nye no; na ebɛnadze ntsi na muhun nyansa seen binom? Ɔno na mekae wɔ m’akoma mu
column5: dɛ iyiara so mpo egyangyandze a."

column2: "Na nkaa biara nnyi hɔ daa mma onyansafo
column3: dɛ ɔkwasea ara so; osiandɛ nda a ɔbɛba no mu no nna werɛ efir hɔn dada. Na hwɛ mbrɛ onyansafo dua wu dɛ ɔkwasea ara so!"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na mikyiir nkwa; osiandɛ dwuma a wodzi no wɔ wi ase no yɛɛ me awerɛhow: osiandɛ ne nyinara yɛ egyangyandze nye ɔberɛ gyan."
"Na mikyiir me berɛ nyinara a meberɛe wɔ wi ase: osiandɛ otwar dɛ medan migya nyimpa a obedzi m’ekyir aba no."
"Na woana nyim
column3: dɛ ɔbɛyɛ onyansafo anaa ɔkwasea o? Naaso obedzi me berɛ nyinara a maberɛ na makyerɛ mu nyansa wɔ wi ase no no do. Iyiara so mpo egyangyandze a."

column2: "Na minyaa abagura wɔ me berɛ a meberɛe wɔ wiadze nyina ho."
"Na nyimpa bi wɔ hɔ a ɔdze nyansa
column3: nye nyimdzee
column4: nye enyigye berɛ; naaso nyimpa a ɔmmberɛ mu bi na ɔbɛdan egya no dɛ ne kyɛfa. Iyiara so egyangyandze nye mbusu kɛse a."

column2: "Na ebɛnadze ara na nyimpa nya no wɔ ne berɛ nyinara
column3: n’akoma n’aperdzi a ɔdze berɛ wɔ wi ase mu?"

column2: "Na ne nda nyinara awerɛhow ara nko
column3: na ne berɛ edwuma yaw a; ampaara
column4: anadwe mpo n’akoma nntɔ ne yamu. Iyiara so egyangyandze a."

column2: "Biribi papa biara nnyi hɔ ma nyimpa sen dɛ obedzidzi na ɔanom
column3: na ɔama ne kra edzi ndzepa wɔ ne berɛ mu. Iyiara so muhunii

column2: "Na woana ara na obenya edzi
column3: na woana ara na n’enyi bɛgye asen emi mara?"

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn dze nyansa
column3: nye nyimdzee
column4: nye dɛw ma nyia ɔsɔ n’enyi no: na ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi dze
column5: ɔma no ɔberɛ edwuma a ɔdze bɔboaboa na ɔahyɛ no kuw
column6: ama ɔdze aama nyia ɔsɔ Nyankopɔn enyi no. Iyiara so egyangyandze na ɔberɛ gyan a."
